name: Puma Survival Simulator
description:
The Puma, also known as the Cougar or Mountain Lion, is a powerful cat. Some call him a super predator, similar to a Leopard. What's more fun than racing across a huge territory attempting to rescue the other members of your puma family? Survive against the elements for as long as you can in the high action wild animal simulator. The secret to the game is survival. There are 2 goals. First, you must rescue all your family members. Second, you must try and defeat all 4 of the giant bosses. In the meantime, you must hunt down your next meal to earn meat points for animal upgrades. When you face off with a giant boss, don't forget to call on your family members for assistance by using the call button.
Top Game Features:

--Hunt down animals to collect meat units
--Rabbits, Ducks, Bats, Deer, Wild Dogs, Horses, Eagles, Crocodiles, and Wolf.
--3 Different Times of Day, including rain
--Massive Open World 3D Map
--Upgrade your Puma Speed, Strength, and Stamina.

HIGH ACTION GAMEPLAY
Addictive game play and Easy controls brings you hours of great animal simulation.
DYNAMIC WEATHER CHANGES
Rain, Sunset, Sunrise, and Night Games.
HIGH QUALITY 3D GRAPHICS
Stunning High Definition graphics bring this forest landscape to life.
UPGRADE YOUR BIG CAT
When you hunt, you earn meat units that can be used to upgrade your Cougar.
HUNTING VICTORIES ARE AUTOMATICALLY RECORDED
Check the chart to see how well you have done in your hunt.
SUPER FUN SOUNDS
Plenty of growling, barking, and bird sounds effects.

This Mountain Lion animal simulator has been designed with all ages in mind. Go wild with the Puma!
